Cell.Data: PLAYER_INTERACTION_SYNDICATE

The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
SCENE ID
TEXT ID
ENGLISH STRING
LOCALIZED STRING
ALTERNATIVE ENGLISH STRING
ALTERNATIVE LOCALIZED STRING
LOCALIZATION NOTES
DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_01

{STR_leaderName}, you wretched thing, how dare you bring your filth to this world? Unless you have very good news for me, I suggest you stay away from Syndicate colonies, if you know what’s good for you.
{STR_leaderName}，你这卑鄙的家伙竟敢玷污这个星球？如果你没有为我带来非常好的消息，那么我建议你离我们辛迪加殖民地远一点，假如你还知道好歹的话。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_02
Oh, it’s you. How I’ve dreaded having to disgrace my station by speaking to your kind. Say your piece, if you must. Bother me further and we’ll find a control collar that fits your neck perfectly…
唉，是你。我害怕跟你们族类说话，因为这会让我蒙受耻辱。如果有话必须说，就快一点。如果再打搅我，我们会根据你的脖子为你量身打造一个控制项圈……

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_01

Ah, {STR_leaderName}, I was wondering when we might cross paths, so to speak. My House runners have told me that you are a force of change on this world. The Syndicate would appreciate you more if they knew where your loyalties truly lie…
啊，{STR_leaderName}，我正在想我们什么时候会见面呢。我的家族运营者告诉我，你是这个星球上一股能够掀起变革的势力。如果辛迪加人知道你真正忠心于谁，我们将会更加感激你…

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_02
{STR_leaderName}, your reputation is known among all in my network. But why have you come here, I wonder? Care to talk business? I’m sure we can come to an agreeable compromise.
{STR_leaderName}，你的声望在我的网络中无人不知。但我想知道你为什么来这儿？想谈谈正事么？我相信我们可以达成一个一致的折中方案。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_03
The Syndicate greets you, {STR_leaderName}. My House has much to offer in trade, if you are that way inclined. We will be watching your progress… closely.
辛迪加人向你问好，{STR_leaderName}。如果你想与我们交易的话，我的家族里有很多东西可以交换。我们会关注你的进展…密切地关注。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_POSITIVE_01

Ah, esteemed {STR_leaderName}. We’ve heard whispers of your exploits, and we are most impressed. These days, the Syndicate is free to do business our own way, and we would love to trade with you. Resources, servants, secrets… whatever you have will be just fine.
啊，尊敬的{STR_leaderName}。我们听说过你的英勇事迹，对此我们感到非常敬佩。现在，辛迪加人能够以自己的方式自由经商，我们想与你们进行贸易。资源、仆人、秘密…无论你有什么都可以。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_POSITIVE_02

Good day to you, noble {STR_leaderName}. The Syndicate has been watching you closely for a while, and we are very pleased with how you have developed. It may be time to exchange information more candidly, perhaps over dinner?
你好，高贵的{STR_leaderName}。辛迪加人已经密切关注你有一阵子了，我们对你的发展方式感到非常满意。是时候更加坦诚地交换一些情报了，也许我们可以在晚餐时间进行讨论？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_NEUTRAL_01
Oh hello. You’re not on our list, but we can schedule you for an appointment in about… three months. Unless there was something urgent?
噢，你好。你不在我们的名单上，但我们可以把你安排在大约…三个月后见面，除非你有什么急事？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_NEUTRAL_02
The greatest house of the Syndicate welcomes your communique. Be sure to choose your words carefully, however. Our rivals’ envy is palpable; who knows how many of their spies are watching us?
辛迪加最伟大的家族对你的声明表示欢迎。不过，一定要小心措辞。我们敌人的嫉妒心显而易见，谁知道有多少他们的间谍正在监视我们？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_PROPOSE_NEUTRAL_01
I have decided to grace you with an invitation to trade with my House. My servants have transmitted the offer. What do you think?
我已决定向你发出邀请与我的家族进行交易。我的仆人已经转达了提议，你意下如何？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_RECEIVED_01
Hmm, a proposition worth consideration. Give me a moment to conduct a cost-benefit analysis.
嗯，这是一个值得考虑的提议。请给我点时间分析一下成本收益。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_WAR_01
Once again you have committed transgressions against my honored House. {STR_reasons}. You have forced my hand to war. Prepare for annihilation! Or don’t, I don’t care.
你再一次犯下了忤逆我伟大家族的罪行。{STR_reasons}。你迫使我向你宣战，准备迎接毁灭吧！不过，我也并不在乎你是否准备好。

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_WAR_02
Just a quick message to let you know we are mobilizing our armies against you to wipe you off the face of this planet. {STR_reasons}. It would be appropriate for you to cower in fear right about now.
这只是一条简短的讯息，让你知道我们正在集结军队向你发动攻击。我们将把你从这个星球抹杀。{STR_reasons}。现在，蜷缩在恐惧之中吧。

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_01
The best insults are equally both clever and devastatingly effective. Are you even able to imagine what it’s like to be either of those things?
最好的侮辱既充满智慧又具有毁灭般的效果。你能想象这样的侮辱降临在你的身上吗？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_02
Dear me, did you get caught in an ion storm, or do you always look like that? In my experience, an unkempt appearance always belies a poor strength of character.
天哪，你这是卷入了离子风暴吗，还是你一直就是这副模样？根据我的经验，蓬头垢面的外表总是掩盖着某种品格上的缺陷。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_03
I always thought the lowest Syndicate houses were the most deplorable wretches in the galaxy. I’ll say one thing for you though: you’ve somehow managed to prove me wrong.
我一直认为最低级的辛迪加家族才是银河系中最卑劣的物种。不过，我得告诉你一件事：你证明了我的想法是错误的。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_01
Oh you do impress us, commander, something not easily done! If you ever need anything, just let me know. I’ll pull some strings... just for you.
噢，你的确让人印象深刻，指挥官。这可不是一件容易的事！如果你需要什么，尽管告诉我。我会在暗中帮助你…并且只是为你哦。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_02
Your personality is so... magnetic! Such a captivating performance of leadership and oratory skills. Perhaps you could even teach me a thing or two!
你的个性很…吸引人！你的领导力和演讲技巧如此迷人，也许你可以教我一两招！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_03
Commander, I LOVE what you’ve done with the place! Your colony is fabulous, and your population tremendous. How curious it is that you didn’t even need to wipe any of their minds...
指挥官，我喜欢你对这个地方所做的一切！你的殖民地非常完美，人口也十分密集。真是奇怪，你甚至不需要抹杀他们的心智就可以做到这一点…

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
ACCEPT_KINDLY_POSITIVE
Wonderful! It’s a deal then. I do so enjoy a good repartee over the metaphorical negotiation table. Let’s get this exchange going, shall we?
好极了！那就这么定了。我确实喜欢在充满隐喻的谈判桌上开展巧妙的对话。让我们开始交易吧，好吗？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
ACCEPT_DOUBTFUL
Alright, I suppose I have to accept. Be sure to put our offering to good use - I would hate to have sacrificed those Indentured for no reason.
好吧，我想我不得不接受了。一定要好好利用我们的提议，我不想白白牺牲那些契约者。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
DECLINE_GENERIC_01
Unfortunately, we cannot acquiesce at this time. Er, that means ‘no thanks’.
不幸的是，我们现在无法同意。呃，我们的意思是“不了，谢谢”。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
DECLINE_IMBALANCE_01
Not a chance, you blaggard. You have vastly underestimated the value of our offerings.
不可能，你这个混蛋。你大大低估了我们提议的价值。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.
